issue.title: Update Datatables library
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Can we update the datatables library ?
We use the 1.9.4 version.
The 1.10+ version:
- supports a lot more plugins 
- ease the AJAX system and can handle simple JSONs formats
- can be styled to match bootstrap and templates overrides (#1013)

Update seems to be easy since we only use "static" datatables for now.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Villemagne Jérôme

+1

Can we (you) list all DT actually used ? (to ease upgrade tests)

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

What I found:

ADMIN:
com_easysdi_contact/organism (in by branch)

SITE:
com_easysdi_core/version (version links etc...)
com_easysdi_catalog/metadata/replication
